metadata.author: AIShield - AIShield.Contact@bosch.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for AIShield AI Security Monitoring

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: ImageClassficationModelEvasionHighSuspiciousVulnDetection_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
This alert creates an incident when Image classification AI Model Evasion high suspicious, high severity vulnerability detected from the AIShield.
properties.displayName: AIShield - Image classification AI Model Evasion high suspicious vulnerability detection
properties.query:
AIShield
| where Message has 'Image Classification AI Model Evasion Attack Identified'
| where Severity =~ 'High'
| where SuspiciousLevel =~ 'high suspicious attack'
| extend NTDomain = tostring(split(Computer, '\\')[0]), HostName = tostring(split(Computer, '.')[0])

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects Image Classification AI Model Evasion high suspicious, high severity alert from AIShield generated at {{TimeGenerated}}.\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: AIShield - Image Classification AI Model Evasion high suspicious vulnerability detected.

properties.description: @{workbookKey=AIShield; logoFileName=AIShield_Logo.svg; description=Visualize events generated by AIShield. This workbook is dependent on a parser AIShield which is a part of the solution deployment.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=AIShield Workbook; templateRelativePath=AIShield.json; subtitle=; provider=Community}.description

properties.displayName: [parameters('workbook1-name')]

properties.description: AIShield AI Security Monitoring data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: AIShield
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: [AIShield](https://www.boschaishield.com/) connector allows users to connect with AIShield custom defense mechanism logs with Microsoft Sentinel, allowing the creation of dynamic Dashboards, Workbooks, Notebooks and tailored Alerts to improve investigation and thwart attacks on AI systems. It gives users more insight into their organization's AI assets security posturing and improves their AI systems security operation capabilities.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function to work as expected [**AIShield**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-boschaishield-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.description: Get all incidents order by time

dataTypes.name: AIShield_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
AIShield_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
| where isnotempty(Time)

value:
AIShield_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

customs.name: Note
customs.description: Users should have utilized AIShield SaaS offering to conduct vulnerability analysis and deployed custom defense mechanisms generated along with their AI asset. [**Click here**](https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/marketplace/apps/rbei.bgsw_aishield_product) to know more or get in touch.

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**AIShield**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-boschaishield-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
>**IMPORTANT:** Before deploying the AIShield Connector, have the Workspace ID and Workspace Primary Key (can be copied from the following).

It gives users more insight into their organization's AI assets security posturing and improves their AI systems security operation capabilities.

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**AIShield**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-boschaishield-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
>**IMPORTANT:** Before deploying the AIShield Connector, have the Workspace ID and Workspace Primary Key (can be copied from the following).

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function to work as expected [**AIShield**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-boschaishield-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

properties.description: AIShield Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: AIShield
properties.query:
AIShield_CL
| extend EventVendor = 'Bosch'
| extend EventProduct = 'AIShield'
| extend Severity = iff(probability_d > 0.50 and suspicious_level_s =~ 'high suspicious attack',"High",iff(probability_d between (0.0..0.50) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'high suspicious attack',"Low",iff(probability_d between (0.0..0.50) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Information",iff(probability_d between (0.50..0.75) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Low",iff(probability_d between (0.75..1) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Medium","unknown")))))
| project-rename
    AttackName = attack_name_s,
    Message = RawMessage_s,
    ServiceName = service_name_s,
    AssetId = asset_id_s,
    EventTimestamp = timestamp_t,
    SourceName = source_name_s,
    SuspiciousLevel = suspicious_level_s,
    Probability = probability_d
| project-away Probability

properties.displayName: AIShield
AIShield
properties.query:
AIShield_CL
| extend EventVendor = 'Bosch'
| extend EventProduct = 'AIShield'
| extend Severity = iff(probability_d > 0.50 and suspicious_level_s =~ 'high suspicious attack',"High",iff(probability_d between (0.0..0.50) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'high suspicious attack',"Low",iff(probability_d between (0.0..0.50) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Information",iff(probability_d between (0.50..0.75) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Low",iff(probability_d between (0.75..1) and suspicious_level_s =~ 'low suspicious attack',"Medium","unknown")))))
| project-rename
    AttackName = attack_name_s,
    Message = RawMessage_s,
    ServiceName = service_name_s,
    AssetId = asset_id_s,
    EventTimestamp = timestamp_t,
    SourceName = source_name_s,
    SuspiciousLevel = suspicious_level_s,
    Probability = probability_d
| project-away Probability

properties.displayName: AIShield AI Security Monitoring
properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The AIShield AI Security Monitoring solution allows users to connect with AIShield custom defense mechanism logs with Microsoft Sentinel. It gives users more insight into their organization's AI assets security posturing and improves their AI systems security operation capabilities.

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  1. Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API

Data Connectors: 1, Parsers: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 9

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
